update KQDS_TREATITEM
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

treatitemno = #{treatitemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update KQDS_TREATITEM set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, treatitemno = #{treatitemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, treatitemname = #{treatitemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, basetype = #{basetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexttype = #{nexttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xmjs = #{xmjs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhxx = #{yhxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, istsxm = #{istsxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, issplit = #{issplit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useflag = #{useflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isyjjitem = #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.* ,d.classify FROM KQDS_TREATITEM t LEFT JOIN HUDH_YKZZ_DRUGS d ON t.SEQ_ID = d.id where 1=1
and ${key} = #{val}

select.if: select treatitemno from KQDS_TREATITEM where organization = #{_parameter} order by createtime desc limit 0,1
select top 1 treatitemno from KQDS_TREATITEM where organization = #{_parameter} order by createtime desc

mapper.select: select treatitemno from KQDS_TREATITEM where seq_id in(${_parameter})

select seq_id,treatitemno,treatitemname from KQDS_TREATITEM where 1=1
and organization = #{_parameter}
select seq_id,treatitemno,treatitemname from KQDS_TREATITEM where 1=1 and organization = #{_parameter}

select * from kqds_treatitem where 1=1 and nexttype =#{nexttype} and useflag = 0
and treatitemname like '%' + #{treatitemname} + '%'
and (isyjjitem != '' + #{isyjjitem} + '' or isyjjitem is null)
order by treatitemno asc

select * from kqds_treatitem where 1=1 and basetype =#{basetype} and nexttype =#{nexttype}
and treatitemname=#{itemname}

select count(1) from kqds_treatitem where 1=1 and nexttype =#{nexttype} and useflag = 0
and treatitemname like '%' + #{treatitemname} + '%'
select count(1) from KQDS_TREATITEM where treatitemno = #{_parameter}
mapper.delete: delete from KQDS_TREATITEM where treatitemno in (${_parameter})
mapper.update: update KQDS_TREATITEM set useflag = 1 where SEQ_ID = #{id}
update KQDS_TREATITEM set useflag = 0 where SEQ_ID = #{id}
